subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although C. C. Sabathia, Mark Teixeira and Manny Ramírez will receive the most attention from the news media because of their status, other free agents have an impact.
snippet: Although C. C. Sabathia, Mark Teixeira and Manny Ramírez will receive the most attention from the news media because of their status, other free agents have an impact.
